column2: Bike Ta Bai: Eco-Friendly Bike Rental Platform
Acceptance Requirement
column8: Comments

column2: Renter can successfully Register Account and Log In.
column8: The registration and login functions worked as intended. The system was able to authenticate new and existing users without errors.

column2: Renter can successfully Search/Filter Bikes by type location and price.
column8: Search and filter functions operated correctly allowing users to find available bikes based on their preferences.

column2: Renter can successfully View Bike Details with images pricing and availability.
column8: Bike details page displayed comprehensive information including multiple images pricing and real-time availability status.

column2: Renter can successfully Book a Bike by selecting date and time range.
column8: Booking creation was completed successfully. The interface allowed users to select rental dates and times without issues.

column2: Renter can successfully Process Payment via GCash QRPH PayMaya Card or Cash.
column8: Payment processing functioned correctly for all payment methods. Gateway payments were processed securely through PayMongo.

column2: Renter can successfully View Booking History and Booking Details.
column8: Booking history displayed all past and current bookings correctly. Booking details showed all relevant information accurately.

column2: Renter can successfully Cancel Booking with refund policy applied.
column8: Cancellation function worked as intended with proper refund calculations based on cancellation timing and policy.

column2: Renter can successfully Update Own Profile Information.
column8: Profile update feature allowed users to modify their information and changes were saved and reflected immediately.

column2: Renter can successfully Change Password with old password verification.
column8: Password change function worked correctly requiring old password verification before allowing new password.

column2: Renter can successfully utilize Forgot Password/Account Recovery function.
column8: Password recovery function sent reset emails correctly and allowed users to reset their passwords successfully.

column2: Renter can successfully View Ratings and Reviews for bikes and owners.
column8: Rating and review display functioned correctly showing all ratings and reviews with proper formatting.

column2: Renter can successfully Submit Rating and Review after completed rental.
column8: Rating submission worked correctly allowing users to rate owners and submit written reviews after completed bookings.

column2: Renter can successfully View Real-time Location Tracking on map during active rental.
column8: Location tracking displayed renter's current location on map correctly with real-time updates every 15 seconds.

column2: Renter receives SMS Alerts for geofence violations and overdue rentals.
column8: SMS notifications were delivered correctly when renter left geofence boundary or rental became overdue.

column2: Renter receives Real-time Notifications for booking confirmations and payment alerts.
column8: In-app notifications via SignalR were received instantly and displayed correctly with proper badge count updates.

column2: Renter can successfully View All Notifications in notifications page.
column8: Notifications page displayed all user notifications correctly with proper categorization and read/unread status.

column2: Renter can successfully View Renter Dashboard with active rentals and statistics.
column8: Dashboard displayed active rentals booking statistics total spent and CO2 saved accurately.

column2: Renter can successfully Grant Location Permission before payment.
column8: Location permission request appeared before payment and system correctly validated permission before allowing payment processing.

column2: Owner can successfully Register Account upload ID Document and verify identity.
column8: Registration and ID upload functioned correctly. OCR verification extracted information from ID documents accurately.

column2: Owner can successfully Add Bike Listing with details images and pricing.
column8: Bike listing creation worked correctly allowing owners to add multiple images set hourly/daily rates and provide detailed descriptions.

column2: Owner can successfully Edit and Remove Bike Listings.
column8: Bike listing management functions worked correctly. Edit function saved changes properly and remove function prevented deletion if bike has active bookings.

column2: Owner can successfully View Rental Requests and Approve/Reject Bookings.
column8: Rental request management functioned correctly. Owners could view pending bookings and approve or reject them with proper notifications sent to renters.

column2: Owner can successfully Verify Cash Payment and activate booking.
column8: Cash payment verification worked correctly activating bookings and starting rental time when owner confirmed payment receipt.

column2: Owner can successfully View Owner Dashboard with earnings and statistics.
column8: Dashboard displayed total earnings pending earnings active rentals and bike statistics accurately.

column2: Owner can successfully Set Store Location and Geofence Settings.
column8: Store location and geofence radius settings were saved correctly and applied to location tracking and geofence alerts.

column2: Owner can successfully View Live Location of renter during active rental.
column8: Real-time location tracking displayed renter's location on map correctly with bike icon marker and geofence circle visible.

column2: Owner can successfully Receive Geofence Violation Notifications.
column8: Owner received in-app notifications immediately when renter left geofence boundary with accurate distance information.

column2: Owner can successfully Report Lost Bike for overdue rentals.
column8: Lost bike reporting function worked correctly marking bookings as reported lost and sending notifications to renters.

column2: Owner can successfully View Location History trail with color coding.
column8: Location history displayed all tracked locations correctly showing the rental trail with proper visualization.

column2: Owner can successfully Confirm Bike Return and complete booking.
column8: Bike return confirmation function worked correctly marking bookings as completed and making bikes available for new rentals.

column2: Owner can successfully View Payment History and Earnings.
column8: Payment history displayed all transactions correctly showing rental payments service fees and net earnings accurately.

column2: Owner can successfully View Ratings and Reviews received from renters.
column8: Rating display functioned correctly showing all ratings and reviews received from renters with proper calculations of average ratings.

column2: Owner can successfully Rate Renter after completed rental.
column8: Rating submission for renters worked correctly allowing owners to rate renters and submit reviews after bookings were completed.

column2: Owner can successfully View All Notifications including booking requests and alerts.
column8: Notifications page displayed all owner notifications correctly including booking requests payment confirmations and geofence alerts.

column2: Owner can successfully View Verification Status for ID document.
column8: Verification status page displayed current verification status correctly showing pending approved or rejected status with admin feedback.

column2: Admin can successfully Log In and access Admin Dashboard.
column8: Admin login and dashboard access functioned correctly with proper role-based authorization preventing unauthorized access.

column2: Admin can successfully View All Users with search and filter options.
column8: User management page displayed all users correctly with working search and filter functions by role and status.

column2: Admin can successfully Suspend/Enable User Accounts.
column8: User account suspension and activation functions worked correctly preventing or allowing login access as intended.

column2: Admin can successfully Delete User Accounts (except admin accounts).
column8: User deletion function worked correctly with proper validation preventing deletion of admin accounts and users with active bookings.

column2: Admin can successfully View Pending Owner Verifications and verify ID documents.
column8: Owner verification management functioned correctly. Admin could view pending verifications and approve or reject them with proper status updates.

column2: Admin can successfully View All Bike Listings with search and filter options.
column8: Bike listing management page displayed all listings correctly with working search and filter functions.

column2: Admin can successfully Manage Bike Listings (set status delete if no active bookings).
column8: Bike listing management functions worked correctly allowing admins to change bike status and delete listings when appropriate.

column2: Admin can successfully Monitor All Bookings with filters by status and date range.
column8: Booking monitoring function displayed all bookings correctly with working filters for status and date range.

column2: Admin can successfully View Dashboard Statistics (users bikes bookings financial).
column8: Dashboard statistics displayed accurate counts and metrics for users bikes bookings and financial data.

column2: Admin can successfully View and Manage Reports with filters by type status priority.
column8: Report management functioned correctly displaying all reports with proper filtering and allowing status updates.

column2: Admin can successfully Generate Analytics and view trends.
column8: Analytics generation worked correctly producing reports on trends demographics and booking patterns.

column2: Admin can successfully Send Admin Broadcast Notifications to all users.
column8: Admin broadcast function worked correctly sending notifications to all users or selected user groups.

column2: Admin can successfully View All Ratings and Reviews with ability to delete inappropriate content.
column8: Review management functioned correctly allowing admins to view all reviews and delete inappropriate content when necessary.

column1: Business Objectives - Did the software application/system meet the business objective?
column2: Yes

column4: The system successfully provided a comprehensive bike rental marketplace connecting bicycle owners with renters while ensuring security through location tracking geofencing and digital payment processing.

column1: Does the software application/system require any setups prior to installation? If so please describe.
column2: Yes

column4: Initial setup includes database configuration API key configuration (PayMongo iProgSMS Google Cloud Vision OpenStreetMap) and creation of initial Admin accounts.

column2: Signature
